data.message:
Wow como la gente puede ser tan ignorante wow envdd q inmaduros yo no soy gay pero los apoyo o sea piensen en sus hijos piensen en sus vida esta bn q si su hijo o hija es gay ustedes los van a dejar de amar o sea por dios cojan conciencia aprendan q amor es amor no importa de donde o hacia quien sea ok aprendan lean no sean ignorantes. 

Wow i cant believe how can people be soo ignorant wow please people im not gay but i sopport them ok they are just like you and me what if you kids were gay will you stop loving them mmm ??? No right gay people have the same rights as any other person ok  please dont be so ignorant please learn from people ho are just trying to be peacefull in the world.

replies.message: I am glad there are people like you in this world to give me hope one day we can all just accept each other as human beings.
